interactions.user_message: Hello, I need help with my account.
interactions.agent_reply: Sure, I can help you with your account. What seems to be the issue?
interactions.reference_reply: How can I assist you with your account?

interactions.agent_reply: No problem, I can help you reset your password.
interactions.reference_reply: Let me assist you in resetting your password.

interactions.agent_reply: You're welcome! If you need anything else, just ask.
interactions.reference_reply: Glad I could help. Have a great day!
